channel.title: Spark on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Spark on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Spark: Improvements, DPA coverage, & dedicated SKU
item.description:
GitHub announced a set of improvements for Spark, introduced a dedicated Spark SKU, and confirmed that Spark is covered by the GitHub Data Processing Agreement (DPA).

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Control AI spending with budget tracking for GitHub AI tools
item.description:
GitHub announced budget-tracking controls for AI tools and the launch of two new premium request SKUs for the GitHub Copilot coding agent and GitHub Spark to help teams manage AI spending as usage grows.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Spark: ðŸš€ Expanded access, enhanced reliability, and faster iteration history
item.description:
GitHub announced Spark is available in Public Preview for Copilot Enterprise customers, including Enterprise Managed Users (EMU) CE. Organization admins can enable Spark to provide access; the release emphasizes expanded access, improved reliability, and faster iteration history.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: Retirement: Spark Native Connector for Semantic Link
item.description:
Microsoft announces the retirement of the Spark native connector effective October 1, 2025, citing low usage, high maintenance costs, and potential security vulnerabilities; source text is truncated before completing the stated goal.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: New Spark sharing option and improved local dev experience
item.description:
GitHub introduced a new organization sharing option for sparks and enhanced the local development experience with smoother workflows and various fixes.

  • Source: GitHub
